author: Timothy Bella
title: This Virtual Reality Product Will Help You De-Stress—and Sleep Better, Too
text: Privacy Policy | About Us Here’s how it works: Attach the Kortex to your VR headset’s strap—it works with the Samsung Gear VR, the Google Daydream VR, and the ZEISS VR ONE Plus—and it will stimulate your brain using low doses of pulsed alternating currents while you watch relaxing VR content, according to Engadget . (Each Kortex comes with a free copy of the first-person game Land’s End .) After 10 minutes of stimulation, you’ll feel more relaxed as a result of neurotransmitter production, Fisher Wallace says. The company recommends using the Kortex once or twice a day for 20 minutes. Want to give it a try? The Kortex will ship to Indiegogo backers starting at $299 in July.
